page.title: 20 OUR SCHOOL HISTORY
page.content: Charles Kingsley was the founder of our school which is called St.Paul's. He made it in 1886 because he wanted the children off the streets. The school was built on Reading Rd.but was later moved to Oxford Rd.in 1967. The school is still on Oxford Road. This school is much more modern and is very warm,even in the middle of winter.It's not dark because there are windows in lots of places.The classrooms are big and spacious.We have four terrapins and one big Portakabin.The school has a mini meadow round the school library and we also have a butterfly garden.Next to the butterfly garden is the field with the pond and the swimming pool.There are 16 adults not including dinner ladies and controllers.There are 11 classes and 1 Portakabin,a hall and an entrance hall.
